resources.string: To reset your password, Please enter your registered email address or mobile number.
You will receive an email or sms with a four digit code to reset yout password shortly. Be sure to check you junk folder if you dont receive in 10 minutes.
You can always contact us at +91-xxxxx-xxxxx or by email.
Four digit code send to your email/mobile. This code is valid for next 2 hours.
Once you receive your code, please enter in the section below.
Please enter a new password below.
Your password must be at least 8, but no more then 20 characters. It must also contain a capital letter(Uppercase letter)and one number.

Your balance is low.
Please recharge your account.
